title: Experience Ghana in United Kingdom
abstract: This study is accomplished to reveal the strategic marketing plan for Experience Ghana to expand their book in the UK travel book market, especially in London. Experience Ghana is a travel guide, which specialized discuss about Ghana. They provide all information and tourism about Ghana. UK travel book market also becomes more potential to enter when we saw from the amount of people from London flight to Ghana. The analysis research consists of field and desk research method to describe the opportunities of Experience Ghana to enter the UK market, which the result of the research showed that the opportunities of Experience Ghana is positive based on the large number of UK people travel to Ghana and highly potential target market for Experience Ghana in UK is also indicated the high level of interest in reading non fiction book from people in UK.
contributors: RENE VAN DEN DRIESCHE (Advisor 1); THEA BURGGRAAF (Advisor 2); E. A. VAN DIJK (Advisor 3); ROB KNOPPER (Examination Committee 1)
source: Skripsi No. 36010175/MAN/2010; Catherine Mediana Layonardo (36406016), Meilisa Hendarlim (36406019)
